name: sliced in sauce
title: Gourmet Mon Petit · sliced in sauce · tuna, salmon, trout
description: Gourmet sliced in sauce tuna, salmon, trout

mainInformation.origin: You can find information about the origin on the packaging in the store.

petFoodBasicInformation.composition: Composition: Chicken (17%) (including bone, meat, skin), dried poultry protein, wheat (15%), corn, corn protein meal, soya meal, wheat gluten, animal fats, wheat middlings, dried chicory root (2%), minerals, digest (with added heat treated Lactobacillus Delbrueckii and Fermentum powder 0.025%), Yeasts.
petFoodBasicInformation.additives: Additives: Nutritional Additives:  IU/kg : Vit A : 720; Vit D3 : 110mg/kg : Iron (II) sulphate monohydrate : (Fe: 8.3); Calcium iodate anhydrous : (I: 0.20); Copper (II) sulphate pentahydrate : (Cu: 0.72); Manganous sulphate monohydrate : (Mn: 1.6); Zinc sulphate monohydrate : (Zn: 14); Taurine : 450. Flavourings.

usageInformation.usage: Feed your adult cat (4kg) up to 4 sachets per day, which should be divided between at least 2 meals.
usageInformation.additionalInformation: Just like you, your little gourmet loves a change. Therefore, allow your cat the pleasure of enjoying various delicacies during the day. GOURMET Mon Petit offers a selection of exquisite GOURMET recipes, specially developed to pamper your velvet paw with a wide variety of flavors, in the right portions for you: fine strips of meat or fish, cooked in a delicate sauce - an irresistible pleasure every time. Prepared with passion by GOURMET, the new GOURMET Mon Petit is offered in small 50-g bags, so that each meal can be served fresh and consumed at once.  GOURMET Mon Petit ... a variety of delicious meals in just the right size.

petFoodStorageInformation.instructions: Feeding guide : Discover also Purina ONE high quality nutrition in wet products with a range of delicious recipes specifically to meet your cat’s tailored needs. The recommended daily amounts should be adjusted to weather conditions, the cat’s level of activity and its physical condition. Clean, fresh drinking water should be available at all times. If you feed PURINA ONE for the first time, we recommend to make the change gradually by mixing an increasing amount of PURINA ONE with your cat’s current food for 7 days period to allow your cat’s digestive system to adapt to the change.

otherInformation.legalDesignation: Complete pet food for adult cats
otherInformation.distributorStreetAndNumber: (CH) Nestlé Suisse S.A., Nestlé Purina PetCare, CP 352, CH-1800 Vevey

remarks.value: Keep pet food in a cool and dry place.

mainSpecificities.value: Füttern Sie Ihrer ausgewachsenen Katze (4kg) im Laufe des Tages 6 bis 7 Portionsbeutel pro Tag,  die auf mindestens 2 Mahlzeiten verteilt werden sollten. Diese Richtwerte basieren auf mässig aktiven Katzen bei normaler Umgebungstemperatur. Individuelle Bedürfnisse können variieren,  sodass die Futtermenge entsprechend angepasst werden sollte,  um ein schlankes,  gesundes Körpergewicht Ihrer Katze zu erhalten. Bitte zimmerwarm servieren. Sauberes,  frisches Wasser sollte stets zur Verfügung stehen.

mainSpecificities.code: Food needs per day in bowls
